24 namespace OnixS {
25 namespace B3 {
26 namespace BOE {
27 
28 /// Network reactor type.
29 struct ReactorType {
30  enum Enum {
31  /// Undefined reactor.
32  Undefined = 0,
33 
34  /// Solarflare TCPDirect reactor.
35  TcpDirect = 1,
36 
37  /// Standard TCP reactor.
38  TcpStandard = 2
39  };
40 };
41 
42 /// Session's network stack reactor interface.
43 class ONIXS_B3_BOE_EXPORTED SessionReactor
44 {
45 public:
46  /// Destructor.
47  virtual ~SessionReactor() ONIXS_B3_BOE_DEFAULT;
48 
49  /// Processes events on a stack and performs the necessary handling.
50  ///
51  /// These events, including transmit and receive events raised by the hardware,
52  /// and also software events such as TCP and FIXP protocol timers.
53  virtual void dispatchEvents() = 0;
54 
55  /// \return a boolean value indicating whether a stack is quiescent.
56  virtual bool isQuiescent() const = 0;
57 
58  /// \return the ID of the thread that created the stack.
59  virtual Threading::ThreadId workingThreadId() const ONIXS_B3_BOE_NOTHROW = 0;
60 
61  /// \return the type of the stack.
62  virtual ReactorType::Enum type() const ONIXS_B3_BOE_NOTHROW = 0;
63 };
64 }
65 }
66 }
